Comments_List: Nurtured a greater understanding of how labour models can be applied, across disciplinary boundaries. Also, developed appreciation/ability for the complexity of economic analysis surrounding the labour market.
Yes. The topics covered in the course are very interesting
Yes. It's an extremely competent and varied assessment of labour economic tools. It can take a bit to get one's head into the right space, but rewarding educationally.
